column2: Why are you such a jerk man? Why can't you just be nice?
column3: Come on I just wanna be friends!
column6: Then why are you sitting alone?
column8: That's not true people don't like you they're just scared!
column9: I'm rubber and you're glue what bounces off me sticks to you.

column3: You don't understand anything. You're the jerk you big jerk.
column4: Why would I want to be friends with you. I have lots of friends I don't need anymore.
column5: No. You're the jerk, i'm the coolest kid at this school.
column6: No, YOU SUCK. *Dustin starts ignoring you*
column7: B-Because my friends are late. They'll be here soon just you watch.
column9: I hate you. *Dustin starts ignoring you*
column10: *Dustin glares at you and ignores you*
column11: You're a liar liar pants on fire.
